html: Spoileth. Baltassar is incorrigible, or his opponents must proceed. (Calmet)—Elam; that is, O Persia: (Challoner) Cyrus, and Darius, theMede. (Calmet)— The former nation was weak, and the latter strong. (Worthington)—Cease. The enemy will shew no pity; nor shall I as Babylon did not heretofore. (Haydock)
